meanings.definition: Not able to be bent or curved.
meanings.sent1: The ruler was unbendable, staying perfectly straight on the desk.
meanings.sent2: The metal rod was unbendable, even when pressure was applied.
meanings.sent3: The unbendable straw refused to bend, causing frustration for the thirsty child.
meanings.sent4: Her unbendable willpower was like a steel beam, unwavering in the face of challenges.
meanings.sent5: The unbendable tree stood tall in the storm, its branches unmoving.

meanings.definition: Not willing to change or compromise.
meanings.sent1: His unbendable stance on the issue made negotiations difficult.
meanings.sent2: She remained unbendable in her decision, despite the opposing arguments.
meanings.sent3: The unbendable cat refused to move from its favorite spot on the couch.
meanings.sent4: Their unbendable loyalty to each other was a bond that could not be broken.
meanings.sent5: The unbendable rock symbolized his unwavering commitment to his beliefs.
